Foster Digital Development & Media Development to Support the Advancing Digital Democracy!

Bangladesh NGOs Network for Radio and Communication (BNNRC) specializes in approaches that leverage media and ICT, such as community radio broadcasting and ICT, to reach underserved communities through implementing the UN World Summit on the Information Society (UN WSIS) action line C1-C11 in Bangladesh since 2006. BNNRC has been registered with the NGO Affairs Bureau, Government of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh, since 2005.

-->

Picture: Bahadur Raichur Rahaman

why
now?


Our Vision:

Foster equitable access to on-demand knowledge for everyone by utilizing appropriate media, promoting constructive public dialogue, and empowering citizen engagement for advancing digital democracy in the context of the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

Our Mission

Enable a media and digital development that fosters a literate, informed, and participatory society, allowing underserved communities to shape their lives and livelihoods through the following:
• Promoting public discourse, encouraging media diversity, and strengthening democracy through the effective use of human-centric digital technology.
• Empowering & amplifying the voices of vulnerable, marginalized, and excluded communities in discussions on development & Digital for Development.
• Collaborating with media and knowledge stakeholders to empower individuals and communities to create positive changes in their lives and livelihoods.
• Serving as a knowledge hub that is both locally rooted and globally connected.

BNNRC Intervention

Training of Trainers on Road Safety for Journalism Concludes

Bangladesh NGOs Network for Radio & Communication (BNNRC), organized a two-day long Training evidence-based approach.

Supporting Media Voices Media Fellowship on Health Journalism

Promoting Health Governance Media Fellowship is an initiative of the Bangladesh NGOs Network for Radio and Communication sector of Bangladesh.

Training Workshop Youth Resilient to Misinformation: Building Local Engagement and Media Development

Bangladesh NGOs Network for Radio and Communication, with the support from The Asia Contribute to strengthening and intensifying existing efforts of the stakeholders to identify the mechanisms for countering misinformation.

WHAT IS THE FOCUS OF BNNRC?

Bangladesh NGOs Network for Radio and Communication (BNNRC) Onboard with the European Union Digital for Development Hub (D4D Hub)

The Bangladesh NGOs Network for Radio and Communication (BNNRC) is pleased to announce onboard with the European Union Digital for Development Hub (D4D Hub). This onboard aims to enhance our collective efforts in advancing digital development initiatives.
